basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ I'm Kelsey Fauntleroy. I'm a recent graduate from University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill where I recieved my Bachelor's in Computer Science and Mathematics. I have experience with the frameworks React, Boostrap and NextJS.

projects.title: I Apply Math
projects.description: The most expanded application I had opportunity to work with. IAM is apart Luz Robinson's dissertation at UNC School Psychology. I'm apart of a team where we've built a website that has two mini math games included. It's to help ease elementary students' math anxiety and is accessible in two languages.

projects.title: Mental Health Tracking App
projects.description: Final project for Modern Web Programming. A mental health tracking app where you can create and keep track of goals you want to accomplish. Users will be able to create an account with a username, email and password which will be entered into our login database. After creating an account the user is automatically sent to create a list of their goals where they are able to delete, edit and check off any item on the list. As well as a settings button that directs them to their account page where they can see their information and delete their account if desired.

projects.title: Emotion Classification
projects.description: My first major project with Machine Learning. The goal of this project is to be able to classify the emotion behind a given text, so a computer or another person can take an appropriate action based on the resulting emotion from the classifier.
